LIGHTS.AMBIENT_COLOUR: The colour of the ambient light
LIGHTS.OMNI_COLOUR: The colour of the omni light
LIGHTS.OMNI_POSITION: The position of the omni light
LIGHTS.OMNI_RADIUS: The full strength radius of the omni light
LIGHTS.OMNI_FALLOFF: The fall-off radius of the omni light
LIGHTS.OMNI_INTENSITY: The intensity multiplier factor of the omni light
LIGHTS.DIRECTIONAL_COLOUR: The colour of the directional light
LIGHTS.DIRECTIONAL_DIRECTION: The direction of the directional light
LIGHTS.DIRECTIONAL_INTENSITY: The intensity multiplier factor of the directional light
LIGHTS.SPOT_COLOUR: The colour of the spot light
LIGHTS.SPOT_POSITION: The position of the spot light
LIGHTS.SPOT_DIRECTION: The direction of the spot light
LIGHTS.SPOT_RADIUS: The full strength radius of the spot light
LIGHTS.SPOT_FALLOFF: The fall-off radius of the spot light
LIGHTS.SPOT_CONE_ANGLE: The cone angle of the spot light
LIGHTS.SPOT_INTENSITY: The intensity multiplier factor of the spot light
